Chordate/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Chordate looked to Kluster.  "Great.  Well, I should at least see it, or one 
of us should, before we start giving out our supplies for free."

===

Nemesis Enforcer looked to Scattershot as he recieved Zardus' com.
"Watch the two fems while I'm gone!  Don't let anything happen!"

"We shall not let them escape!" Scattershot chuckled madly, holding up 
DeathStorm's battered, decapitated head.

Nemesis sighed, leaving the room.  He entered the bridge, looking to Zardus.  
"I am ready."
